source_sentence: 從舍頭諫經下四十三部六十一卷除四阿含外諸重譯經闕本。
translation: From the following forty-three sections and sixty-one volumes of the Śārdūla-karṇa sūtra down through the four Āgamas, there are deficiencies in the texts of the other sūtras translated.

source_sentence: 小乘經單譯闕本四百八十一部五百五十一卷佛本行經五卷後漢天竺三藏竺法蘭譯佛本生經一卷後漢天竺三藏竺法蘭譯悔過法經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯五法經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯五行經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯小般泥洹經一卷(祐錄云或名泥洹後諸比丘經或云泥洹後變記經或云泥洹後比丘世變經或云佛般泥洹後比丘世高經)後漢安息三藏安世高譯正齊經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯分明罪福經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯難提迦羅越經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯禪定方便次第法經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯禪法經一卷(祐錄無經字)後漢安息三藏安世高譯當來變滅經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯墮落優婆塞經一卷(或云優祓塞)後漢西域三藏支曜譯問地獄事經一卷後漢外國沙門唐巨譯報福經一卷(或云福報經)後漢外國三藏康孟詳譯梵志經一卷吳天竺沙門竺律炎譯七漏經一卷(安公古典中有亦名七漏鈔云出阿含)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯悔過法經一卷(一名釵十方禮拜悔過文或無法字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯賢者德經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯梵志結淨經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯阿質國王經一卷(祐錄無國字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯惟婁王師子潼譬喻經一卷(本無譬喻字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯藍達王經一卷(亦云目連因緣功德亦云目連功德)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯百喻經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯五陰事經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯魔化作比丘經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯優多羅母經一卷(或無母字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯人民求願經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯坐禪經一卷吳西域三藏康僧會譯摩目揵連本經一卷(一本有訶字無揵字)西晉三藏竺法護譯五福施經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯觀行不移四事經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯四婦喻經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯廬夷亘經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯廅羅王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯龍施經一卷(今疑是龍施菩薩本起經)西晉三藏竺法護譯給孤獨明德經一卷(亦云給孤獨氏經)西晉三藏法護譯龍王兄弟陀達誡王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯勸化王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯鴈王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯鴈王五百鴈俱經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯解無常經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯城喻經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯降龍經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯邪法經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯犯罪經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯苦應經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯三品修行經一卷(一名三品悔過經)西晉三藏竺法護譯失那羅經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯賈客經二卷西晉三藏竺法護譯沙門果證經一卷(今疑與寂志果經同本)西晉三藏竺法護譯貧女為國王夫人經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯誡王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯誡具經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯誡羅云經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯危脆經一卷西晉三藏釋法炬譯大蛇譬喻經一卷(亦名大蛇經)西晉沙門釋法炬譯羅漢迦留陀夷經一卷(或無羅漢字)西晉沙門釋法炬譯抓甲擎土譬經一卷(一名爪甲取土經)西晉沙門釋法炬譯衰利經一卷西晉沙門釋法炬譯眾生未然三界經一卷西晉沙門釋法炬譯求欲說法經一卷西晉沙門釋法炬譯羅旬喻經一卷(今疑是別生中羅彌壽經異名)西晉沙門釋法炬譯法禪法經一卷東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯梵天策數經一卷東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯諸天地經一卷東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯分衛經一卷東晉西域三藏祇多蜜譯撿諸罪福經一卷姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯十二因緣觀經一卷姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯善德優婆塞經一卷宋涼州沙門釋智嚴譯阿那含經二卷宋涼州沙門釋智嚴譯釋六十二見經四卷(祐錄云一卷)宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯請般特比丘經一卷(或作般持亦云般時)宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯十二頭陀經一卷宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯阿那律七念章一卷宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯十報法三統略經一卷宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯弟子事佛吉凶經一卷(祐云弟子問事佛吉凶經)宋居士沮渠京聲譯生死變識經一卷(今疑是藏中見正經異名)宋居士沮渠京聲譯譬喻經一卷宋沙門釋慧簡譯五百本生經一卷蕭齊西域三藏摩訶乘譯頂生王因緣經一卷(舊錄云頂生王經後漢失譯)長者賢首經一卷(後漢失譯)梵志喪女經一卷(舊錄云[狂-王+樂]狗經後漢失譯)[狂-王+樂]狗齧王經一卷(舊錄云[狂-王+樂]狗經後漢失譯)勤苦泥黎經一卷(後漢失譯)地獄經一卷(後漢失譯)十一因緣章經一卷(舊錄云十一因緣經或作十二後漢失譯)沙門為十二頭陀經一卷(後漢失譯)五十五法誡經一卷(或云五十五法行經)僧祐錄云。
translation: 小乘經單譯闕本四百八十一部五百五十一卷佛本行經五卷後漢天竺三藏竺法蘭譯佛本生經一卷後漢天竺三藏竺法蘭譯悔過法經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯五法經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯五行經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯小般泥洹經一卷(祐錄云或名泥洹後諸比丘經或云泥洹後變記經或云泥洹後比丘世變經或云佛般泥洹後比丘世高經)後漢安息三藏安世高譯正齊經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯分明罪福經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯難提迦羅越經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯禪定方便次第法經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯禪法經一卷(祐錄無經字)後漢安息三藏安世高譯當來變滅經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯墮落優婆塞經一卷(或云優祓塞)後漢西域三藏支曜譯問地獄事經一卷後漢外國沙門唐巨譯報福經一卷(或云福報經)後漢外國三藏康孟詳譯梵志經一卷吳天竺沙門竺律炎譯七漏經一卷(安公古典中有亦名七漏鈔云出阿含)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯悔過法經一卷(一名釵十方禮拜悔過文或無法字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯賢者德經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯梵志結淨經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯阿質國王經一卷(祐錄無國字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯惟婁王師子潼譬喻經一卷(本無譬喻字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯藍達王經一卷(亦云目連因緣功德亦云目連功德)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯百喻經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯五陰事經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯魔化作比丘經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯優多羅母經一卷(或無母字)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯人民求願經一卷吳月支優婆塞支謙譯坐禪經一卷吳西域三藏康僧會譯摩目揵連本經一卷(一本有訶字無揵字)西晉三藏竺法護譯五福施經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯觀行不移四事經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯四婦喻經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯廬夷亘經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯廅羅王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯龍施經一卷(今疑是龍施菩薩本起經)西晉三藏竺法護譯給孤獨明德經一卷(亦云給孤獨氏經)西晉三藏法護譯龍王兄弟陀達誡王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯勸化王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯鴈王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯鴈王五百鴈俱經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯解無常經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯城喻經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯降龍經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯邪法經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯犯罪經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯苦應經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯三品修行經一卷(一名三品悔過經)西晉三藏竺法護譯失那羅經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯賈客經二卷西晉三藏竺法護譯沙門果證經一卷(今疑與寂志果經同本)西晉三藏竺法護譯貧女為國王夫人經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯誡王經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯誡具經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯誡羅云經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯危脆經一卷西晉三藏釋法炬譯大蛇譬喻經一卷(亦名大蛇經)西晉沙門釋法炬譯羅漢迦留陀夷經一卷(或無羅漢字)西晉沙門釋法炬譯抓甲擎土譬經一卷(一名爪甲取土經)西晉沙門釋法炬譯衰利經一卷西晉沙門釋法炬譯眾生未然三界經一卷西晉沙門釋法炬譯求欲說法經一卷西晉沙門釋法炬譯羅旬喻經一卷(今疑是別生中羅彌壽經異名)西晉沙門釋法炬譯法禪法經一卷東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯梵天策數經一卷東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯諸天地經一卷東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯分衛經一卷東晉西域三藏祇多蜜譯撿諸罪福經一卷姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯十二因緣觀經一卷姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯善德優婆塞經一卷宋涼州沙門釋智嚴譯阿那含經二卷宋涼州沙門釋智嚴譯釋六十二見經四卷(祐錄云一卷)宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯請般特比丘經一卷(或作般持亦云般時)宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯十二頭陀經一卷宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯阿那律七念章一卷宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯十報法三統略經一卷宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯弟子事佛吉凶經一卷(祐云弟子問事佛吉凶經)宋居士沮渠京聲譯生死變識經一卷(今疑是藏中見正經異名)宋居士沮渠京聲譯譬喻經一卷宋沙門釋慧簡譯五百本生經一卷蕭齊西域三藏摩訶乘譯頂生王因緣經一卷(舊錄云頂生王經後漢失譯)長者賢首經一卷(後漢失譯)梵志喪女經一卷(舊錄云[狂-王+樂]狗經後漢失譯)[狂-王+樂]狗齧王經一卷(舊錄云[狂-王+樂]狗經後漢失譯)勤苦泥黎經一卷(後漢失譯)地獄經一卷(後漢失譯)十一因緣章經一卷(舊錄云十一因緣經或作十二後漢失譯)沙門為十二頭陀經一卷(後漢失譯)五十五法誡經一卷(或云五十五法行經)僧祐錄云。
An Gong classical scripture.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄一切善惡經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: This is a one-volume scripture on all good and evil that is appended to the Han register.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄說善惡道經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Sutra of Explaining the Paths of Good and Evil from the Han Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is the classical sūtra of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄愛欲聲經一卷(本云愛欲一聲經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append to this Han record a single volume of the Sutra on the Sound of Desire (originally, it was called the Sutra on the Single Sound of Desire), as recorded by Sengyou.
"The classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄摩訶遮曷涉經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append to this Han record a single volume of the Mahācārya-hosanna sūtra, which Sengyou recorded as follows.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄天王下作猪經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a single volume of the Han Register of the Sutra of the Making of Pigs Under the Heavenly Kings, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄始造浴佛時經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append to this Han register a volume of the Sutra of the First Creation of the Buddha's Bath, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is the classical sūtra of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄十二賢者經一卷(舊錄云十三賢經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a single volume of the Sutra of the Twelve Bhadharmas from the Han Register (the old register reads Thirteen Bhadharmas), as recorded by Sengyou.
"The classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄佛併父弟調達經一卷(安公云上十經出毘曇今移一本重譯中)僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach one volume of the Han Register of the Reconciliation of Buddhas, Fathers, and Disciples (An Gong Yun's translation of the previous ten sūtras from the Vedas is now being retranslated from one copy to another), as recorded by Sengyou.
"Angong's classical sūtras.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄憂墮羅迦葉經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Han Register of the Sutra of Śuddhodana-kāśyapa, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's Classical Sutra.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄四部本文經一卷(安公云上二經出長阿含一本云出阿毘曇)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach one volume of the four part Benben sūtras from the Han Register (An Gong said the above two sūtras were from the Chang'ahan and one was from the Abhidharma), as recorded by Sengyou.
"Angong's classical scriptures.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄讓德經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach one volume of the Han Register of Rangde sūtras, as recorded by Sengyou.
"Angong's classical sūtras.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄有賢者法經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a single volume of the Sutra of the Dharma of the Bhadraśri Saṃgha to the Han Register, and it's recorded in the Monk's List as follows.
"This is the classical sūtra of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄摩訶厥彌難問經一卷(或云大厥彌經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach one volume of the Mahākauṣṭhila-sūtra (or Mahākauṣṭhila-sūtra) from the Han Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"The classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄大本藏經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Han Register of the Mahākauṣṭhila Sutra, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's Classical Sutra.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄說阿難持戒經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Han Register Sutra on Observing the Precepts of Ānanda, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄阿難問何因緣持戒見世間貧亦現道貧經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a one-volume sūtra from the Han Register that explains Ānanda's question about the causes and conditions for observing precepts, seeing that the world is poor and the present path is poor, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's Classical Sutra.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄給孤獨四姓家問應愛施經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a volume of the Han Catalogue of Sutras on Giving to Lonely Families of Four Castes Who Ask for Loving Charity," as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄曉所諍不解經者經一卷(今疑上經字錯)僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Sutra of Those Who Don't Understand the Sutra to the Han Register (now I suspect that the above word is wrong)," said Sengyou's Record.
"An Gong's Classical Sutra.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄奇異道家難問住處經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a single volume of the Han Register of Strange Taoists' Difficult Questions about Their Abodes, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄賢者手力經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a single volume of the Sutra of the Power of the Hands of the Good One from the Han Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is the classical sūtra of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄八法行經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of the Eight Practices from the Han Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong's.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄憂多羅經一卷(或作優字)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of Uttarakuru from the Han Register (also known as the Letter U), as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄栴檀調佛經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Sutra of the Taming of the Buddha with Sandalwood from the Han Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄惡人經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Sutra on Evil People from the Han Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong's. Now I'll attach a volume of the Han record of the Nandanavana Sutra.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄難提和難經一卷(或云難提和羅經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach one volume of the Han Register of Nandika and Nandika Sutras (or Nandika and Nandika Sutras), as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄四姓長者難經一卷(舊錄云四姓長者)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Sutra of the Difficulties of the Elders of the Four Castes from the Han Register (the old register says, "The Elders of the Four Castes"), as recorded by Sengyou.
"The classical scripture of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄折佛經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach one volume of the Han Register of Folding Buddha Sutras, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's classical sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附漢錄雜數經二十卷(魏吳失譯)那先譬喻經四卷(魏吳失譯)太子試藝本起經二卷(魏吳失譯)深斷連經二卷(魏吳失譯)摩訶目揵連與佛角能經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿難得道經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿難般泥洹經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿那律念復生經一卷(魏吳失譯)沙門分衛見怪異經一卷(魏吳失譯)弟子本行經一卷(高僧傳云白法祖譯魏吳失譯)為壽盡天子說法經一卷(舊錄云命盡天子經魏吳失譯)魔試佛經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿須倫問八事經一卷(舊錄云阿須倫所問八事經魏吳失譯)摩竭王經一卷(舊錄云摩竭國王經魏吳失譯)薩波達王經一卷(魏吳失譯)年少王經一卷(魏吳失譯)是先太子經一卷(魏吳失譯)長者難提經一卷(魏吳失譯)女利行經一卷(魏吳失譯)四婦因緣經一卷(魏吳失譯)須多羅經一卷(魏吳失譯舊錄云須多羅入胎經)隨迦經一卷(晉言堅強合在晉錄魏吳失譯)般達龍王經一卷(魏吳失譯)牛米自供養經一卷(舊錄無養字魏吳失譯)行牧食牛經一卷(或作放字魏吳失譯)隨釋迦牧牛經一卷(或作墮魏吳失譯)法嚴經一卷(疑即是等入法嚴經)譬四經一卷(魏吳失譯)止寺中經一卷(魏吳失譯)安般行道經一卷(魏吳失譯)解慧微妙經一卷(魏吳失譯)失道得道經一卷(魏吳失譯)心情心識經一卷(魏吳失譯)撿意向正經一卷(魏吳失譯)道得果證經一卷(魏吳失譯)父子因緣經一卷(魏吳失譯)小觀世樓炭經一卷(魏吳失譯)大四諦經一卷(魏吳失譯)五方便經一卷(魏吳失譯)五惟越羅名解說經一卷(魏吳失譯)五陰經一卷(魏吳失譯)中五世經一卷(魏吳失譯)大七車經一卷(魏吳失譯)八正邪經一卷(祐云八正部經魏吳失譯)八總持經一卷(魏吳失譯)八輩經一卷(魏吳失譯)大十二因緣經一卷(魏吳失譯)十八難經一卷(魏吳失譯)五十二章經一卷(別有孝明四十二章經魏吳失譯)百八愛經一卷(似抄五蓋疑結經魏吳失譯)小安般舟三昧經一卷(魏吳失譯)禪數經一卷(魏吳失譯)群生偈經一卷(魏吳失譯)十二死經一卷(今疑是十二品生死經)僧祐錄云。
translation: 今附漢錄雜數經二十卷(魏吳失譯)那先譬喻經四卷(魏吳失譯)太子試藝本起經二卷(魏吳失譯)深斷連經二卷(魏吳失譯)摩訶目揵連與佛角能經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿難得道經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿難般泥洹經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿那律念復生經一卷(魏吳失譯)沙門分衛見怪異經一卷(魏吳失譯)弟子本行經一卷(高僧傳云白法祖譯魏吳失譯)為壽盡天子說法經一卷(舊錄云命盡天子經魏吳失譯)魔試佛經一卷(魏吳失譯)阿須倫問八事經一卷(舊錄云阿須倫所問八事經魏吳失譯)摩竭王經一卷(舊錄云摩竭國王經魏吳失譯)薩波達王經一卷(魏吳失譯)年少王經一卷(魏吳失譯)是先太子經一卷(魏吳失譯)長者難提經一卷(魏吳失譯)女利行經一卷(魏吳失譯)四婦因緣經一卷(魏吳失譯)須多羅經一卷(魏吳失譯舊錄云須多羅入胎經)隨迦經一卷(晉言堅強合在晉錄魏吳失譯)般達龍王經一卷(魏吳失譯)牛米自供養經一卷(舊錄無養字魏吳失譯)行牧食牛經一卷(或作放字魏吳失譯)隨釋迦牧牛經一卷(或作墮魏吳失譯)法嚴經一卷(疑即是等入法嚴經)譬四經一卷(魏吳失譯)止寺中經一卷(魏吳失譯)安般行道經一卷(魏吳失譯)解慧微妙經一卷(魏吳失譯)失道得道經一卷(魏吳失譯)心情心識經一卷(魏吳失譯)撿意向正經一卷(魏吳失譯)道得果證經一卷(魏吳失譯)父子因緣經一卷(魏吳失譯)小觀世樓炭經一卷(魏吳失譯)大四諦經一卷(魏吳失譯)五方便經一卷(魏吳失譯)五惟越羅名解說經一卷(魏吳失譯)五陰經一卷(魏吳失譯)中五世經一卷(魏吳失譯)大七車經一卷(魏吳失譯)八正邪經一卷(祐云八正部經魏吳失譯)八總持經一卷(魏吳失譯)八輩經一卷(魏吳失譯)大十二因緣經一卷(魏吳失譯)十八難經一卷(魏吳失譯)五十二章經一卷(別有孝明四十二章經魏吳失譯)百八愛經一卷(似抄五蓋疑結經魏吳失譯)小安般舟三昧經一卷(魏吳失譯)禪數經一卷(魏吳失譯)群生偈經一卷(魏吳失譯)十二死經一卷(今疑是十二品生死經)僧祐錄云。
"An Gong's Lost Translation of the Sutra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄七婦經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of the Seven Wives (a translation from the Western Jin dynasty) was recorded by Sengyou as a misprint.
An Gong's Lost Translation.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄阿難邠坻四時施經一卷(舊云阿難邠祈四時布施經)僧祐錄云。
translation: It's a one-volume scripture appended to the Western Jin Dynasty record of Anan Putin's four periods of giving (the old version was Anan Putinji's four periods of giving).
"An Gong lost his translation of the sūtra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄七車經一卷(今疑是中阿含中七車譬喻經)僧祐錄云。
translation: One volume of the Sutra on the Seven Chariots (now suspected to be the Sutra on the Parable of the Seven Chariots in the Middle Length Āgamas) is appended to the Record of Saṃyuktâgama.
"An Gong's Lost Translation of the Sutra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄海有八事經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a one-volume version of the Sutra on the Eight Cases in the Western Jin Dynasty Record, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's Lost Translation of the Sutra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄難等各第一經一卷(舊錄云阿難迦葉各說第一經)僧祐錄云。
translation: It's accompanied by a one-volume version of the Nan and Other First Sutra from the Western Jin Dynasty Record (the old record says that Ānanda Kāśyapa each spoke the first sūtra), as recorded by Sengyou.
"Angong lost his translation of the sūtras.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄惟留經一卷(舊錄云惟留王經)僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to the Western Jin Dynasty Record of the Weiliu Sutra in one volume (the old record is called the Weiliu wang jing), as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's Lost Translation of the Sutra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄理家難經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a single volume of the Rijia nan jing (Old Record: Weiliu wang jing), as recorded by Sengyou.
"Angong lost his translation of the sūtra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄迦留多王經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a one-volume edition of the Sutra of King Kaliuta from the Western Jin dynasty, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's Lost Translation of the Sutra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄梵志闍孫經一卷(舊錄云梵志闍遜經)僧祐錄云。
translation: It's accompanied by a one-volume translation of the Sutra of Fanzhi Jiasun from the Western Jin dynasty (the old record is called the Sutra of Fanzhi Jiasun), which was recorded by Sengyou as follows.
"An Gong's lost translation is a scripture.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄波達王經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a single volume of the Sutra of King Bhadra recorded in the Western Jin dynasty, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong lost his translation of the sutra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄悲心悒悒經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a one-volume sutra of the Western Jin dynasty record of the compassionate mind, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong lost his translation of the sūtra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄趣度世道經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a one-volume edition of the Sutra of the Way of the World from the Xijin Canon, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong lost his translation of the sūtra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄長者威勢經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a one-volume monk's translation of the Sutra of the Authority of the Elder from the Western Jin dynasty.
"An Gong's lost translation of the sūtra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄癡注經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's accompanied by a one-volume edition of the Sutra of the Idiotic Commentary from the Xijin Canon, which Sengyou recorded as follows.
"An Gong lost his translation of the sūtra.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄調達經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a one-volume edition of the Sutra of Adjustment from the Xijin Canon, as recorded by Sengyou.

source_sentence: 安公失譯附西晉錄和達經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: The lost translation of Angong's sūtra was appended to a one-volume version of the Sutra of Concord from the Western Jin dynasty, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong's Lost Translation.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄鉢呿沙經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: It's appended to a single volume of the Sutra of Bayonza from the Western Jin dynasty, as recorded by Sengyou.

source_sentence: 安公失譯附西晉錄八分舍利經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: The lost translation of An Gong was appended to a one-volume version of the Sutra of the Eight Part Vairocana from the Western Jin Dynasty, as recorded by Sengyou.
An Gong's Lost Translation.

source_sentence: 附西晉錄薩惒薩王經一卷(三秦失譯)阿多三昧經一卷(三秦失譯)陀賢王經一卷(或作阿陀三秦失譯)颰陀悔過經一卷(三秦失譯)方等決經一卷(三秦失譯)比丘二事經一卷(祐錄云三事三秦失譯)阿難為蠱道呪經一卷(舊錄云阿難所蠱道所呪經今疑是藏中摩鄧女經)僧祐錄云安公關中異經。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of King Saptar (a translation lost in the Sanqin), one volume of the Samādhi-sūtra of Ado (a translation lost in the Sanqin), one volume of the Sutra of King Doxian (a translation lost in the Sanqin), one volume of the Sutra of Bhadra's Repentance (a translation lost in the Sanqin), one volume of the Sutra of Equanimous Judgment (a translation lost in the Sanqin), one volume of the Sutra of the Two Affairs of Bhikṣus (a translation lost in the Sanqin), one volume of the Sutra of Anan's Compulsion (a translation lost in the Sanqin), and one volume of the Sutra of Anan's Compulsion (a translation of the old record of the Sutra of Anan's Compulsion), which is now suspected to be the Sutra of the Mātaṅgī in the Canon.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄王舍城靈鷲山經一卷(舊錄云王舍城靈鷲山要真經)僧祐錄云。
translation: (The old record says that it's the Sutra of the Spiritual Vulture Mountains of Rājagṛha.) The Saṃyuktâgama records say that An Gong Guanzhong's sūtra is different.
"An Gong Guanzhong yijing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄思道經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach one volume of the Qin Record of the Sutra of the Path of Contemplation, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong Guanzhong yixing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄佛在竺園經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now attach a single volume of the Qin Translation of the Sutra of the Buddha's Life in the Garden of India (Sengyou lu).
"An Gong Guanzhong yijie jing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄法為人經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Qin Records of the Dharma as a Human Being sūtra, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong Guanzhong yixing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄道意經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of the Way's Intent recorded in the Qin dynasty, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong Guanzhong yijie jing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄阿夷比丘經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Qin Translation of the Sutra of Ārya the Bhikṣu, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong Guanzhong yisheng.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄八德經一卷今疑是僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of the Eight Virtues from the Qin Records, which is now suspected to be the same as the one in the Monk's Record.
"An Gong Guanzhong yixing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄善德經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of Good Virtue from the Qin Canon, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong Guanzhong yixing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄摩訶揵陀惟衛羅盡信比丘等度經一卷(舊錄云盡信比丘經)僧祐錄云。
translation: Now I'll append one volume of the Qin Record of the Sutra of Endowment of Faith Bhikṣu and Equanimity (the old record is called the Sutra of Endowment of Faith Bhikṣu), as Saṃyuktâgama records it.
"An Gong Guanzhong yijie jing.

source_sentence: 今附秦錄瓶沙王經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: Now we append one volume of the Sutra of King Bimbisāra from the Qin records.
"Angong Liangtu yisheng jing.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄有無經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Liang Translation of the Sutra on Existence and Absence, and it's been recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from Angong Liang's land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄五百偈經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of Five Hundred Verses from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant scripture of Angong's Liang land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄須耶越國貧經一卷(舊云須耶越國貧人賃別頭經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach one volume of the Poor Man's Sutra of Su-yue-yue (old: Poor Man's Lease of Different Heads in Su-yue) from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong Liangtu yixing jing.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄浮木經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach one volume of the Liangshuo lufumu jing (Sengyou lu).
"This is a different scripture from Angong's Liang land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄坯喻經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Liangliang lu bao yujing to this record, and it's in the form of a monk's commentary.
"This is the An Gong Liangtu yiji jing.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄妖怪經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended a single volume of the Sutra on Demons and Monsters, which Sengyou recorded as follows.
"This is the An Gong Liangtu yiji jing.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄阿般計泥洹經一卷(一本陶躬計泥洹經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Nirvana Sutra of Aparañjana to the Liang Register (a copy of the Nirvana Sutra of Taoism), and it's recorded in the Monk's Record as saying.
"An Gong Liangtu yisheng jing.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄四非常經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach one volume of the four extraordinary scriptures from the Liang Canon, as recorded by Sengyou.
"An Gong Liangtu yixing jing.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄五失蓋經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: Now, I'll append one volume of the five scriptures on the loss of coverings from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from Angong's Liang land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄要直經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach a single volume of the Essentials of the Straight Path Sutra from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄本無經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the originally nonexistent sūtras from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄勸德經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of Encouragement of Virtue from the Liang Collection, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄十五德經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of Fifteen Virtues from the Liang Collection, which Sengyou recorded as follows.
"This is a different scripture from the Liang land of Angong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄父母因緣經一卷(今疑與父子因緣同)僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of Parents from the Liang Collection (now suspected to be the same as the Causes and Conditions of Fathers and Sons), as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from Angong's Liang land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄慧行經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach a single volume of the Sutra of Wisdom and Action from the Liang Collection," said the Record of Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from the Liang land of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄未生王經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Weishengwang jing to the Liang Records, and it's recorded in the Sengyou Records.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄內外無為經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra on Internal and External Weed from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture of the Liang land from that of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄道淨經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Daoxing Sutra from the Liang Records, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄七事本末經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra on the Merits of Seven Matters from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄百寶三昧經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sanmei Sutra of the Hundred Treasures from the Liang Collection, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄三乘經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sanshō Sūtra from the Liang Collection, as recorded by Sengyū.
"This is a different scripture from An Gong's Liang land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄耆域術經一卷(舊錄云耆域西術經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Sutra of Jīvaka Arts to the Liang Register (the old register says, "The Sutra of Jīvaka Western Arts.") The entry of Sengyou says.
"An Gong Liangtu yisheng.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄五蓋離疑經一卷(今疑是五蓋疑結失行經)僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Sutra of Five Caps Free from Doubt to this Liang Record (now suspected to be the Sutra on the Loss of Conduct in Doubt of the Five Caps).
"This is a different scripture from Angong's Liang land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄太子智止經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append one volume of the Taishi Zhizhi jing from the Liang Collection, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang Translation of the Sutra of the Prince of Zhi Zhi.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄道德章經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I've appended one volume of the Dao Dezhang jing from the Liang Collection, and it's recorded in the Monk's Record.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄苦相經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of the Characteristics of Suffering from the Liang Collection, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄須弗得度經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Sutra of Sufataru from the Liang Collection, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄由經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append a single volume of the Liangliang lu yujing, which is recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant of the An Gong Liang land sūtra.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄分然洹國迦羅越經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I now append to this Liangluo a volume of the Sutra of Kālôdayôttara in Fennan, recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from An Gong's Liang land.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄五陰事經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll append a single volume of the Sutra on the Five Aggregates from the Liang Collection, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from the Liang territory of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄義決法事經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll append a single volume of the Sutra of the Questions of the Dharma of Ryōgō to this record, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant scripture of the Liang land of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄十思惟經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach a single volume of the Sutra of Ten Contemplations from the Liang Records, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from the Liang land of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄分別六情經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach a single volume of the Sutra on Discriminating the Six Faculties from the Liang Records, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant scripture of the Liang land of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄三失蓋經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll append a single volume of the Sutra on the Three Lost Covers from the Liang Register, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a variant scripture of the Liang land of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄佛寶三昧經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll append a single volume of the Liang lu's Samādhi Sutra of the Buddha's Treasures, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from the Liang land of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄法志女經一卷僧祐錄云。
translation: I'll now attach a single volume of the Sutra of the Dame of Dharma from the Liang Records, as recorded by Sengyou.
"This is a different scripture from the Liang region of An Gong.

source_sentence: 今附涼錄出要經二十卷行道經七卷長阿含經三卷(祐云疑是殘缺長阿含經)弘道經二卷四天王經一卷(祐云後有呪似人所附)諸天阿須倫闕經一卷金色女經一卷(雜譬喻中有祐云異出本)治禪鬼魅不安經一卷瞻波國佛說戒經一卷佛在誓枝山說法經一卷佛三毒事經一卷佛七事經一卷佛開和伏經一卷佛意行經一卷因佛生三心經一卷佛聚經一卷七佛本然緣經一卷釋迦文枝鉢經一卷佛袈裟經一卷佛大衣經一卷迦葉解經一卷迦葉因緣經一卷舍利弗問暑經一卷迦葉獨證自誓經一卷舍利弗嘆度女人經一卷舍利弗生西方經一卷舍利弗目連泥洹經一卷(今疑是生經中舍利弗般泥洹經)目連所問經一卷目連因緣經一卷阿難見變經一卷難陀經一卷阿難陀經一卷阿那含七念經一卷羅漢菩子經一卷賓頭盧取鉢經一卷愛行比丘經一卷愛身比丘經一卷梅比丘經一卷善星比丘經一卷六群比丘經一卷自在王比丘經一卷羅耶達比丘經一卷比丘和須蜜經一卷玄戒未來比丘經一卷(今疑玄字錯)釋種子經一卷尊者婆蹉律經一卷罽賓二沙彌經一卷沙彌持戒經一卷海州優婆塞會經一卷賢者雜事經一卷弟子修學經一卷弟子行澤中遇賊劫經一卷弟子精進經一卷迦提羅越問五戒經一卷那羅延天王經一卷毘沙門天王經一卷四大天王經一卷諸天壽經一卷魔現成佛經一卷魔王試經一卷淨飯王經一卷佛葬閱頭檀王經一卷阿育王作小兒時經一卷(今疑出阿育王傳)小阿育王經一卷優填王照逝心女經一卷(今疑是大乘)迦夷王頭布施經一卷果尊王經一卷佛居士經一卷降恐王經一卷摩羅王經一卷摩登王經一卷舍夷國經一卷比丘法相經一卷羅提抵王經一卷摩訶惟越王經一卷流沙經一卷十四王經一卷王以竹施經一卷勸王持五戒經一卷太子旃舍羅差經一卷長者盛德經一卷長者法心經一卷長者仁賢經一卷長者洹羅越經一卷佛問淳陀長者愛樂淨行經一卷婆羅門問事經一卷婆羅門等爭說經一卷六師詣波斯匿王經一卷尼揵齋經一卷明星梵志經一卷兜率梵志經一卷梵志拔陀經一卷梵志計火淨經一卷梵志問疑經一卷梵志意經一卷梵志好母經一卷梵志女經一卷梵志六師經一卷天后賢女經一卷德女問經一卷貧女少施獲弘報經一卷彌家女經一卷二人作沙門弟斷兄舌經一卷氣噓殺旃陀羅經一卷眼能視殺人經一卷孤獨三兄弟經一卷阿劍他經一卷不蘭伽經一卷小申日經一卷波羅奈媈四姓經一卷(或作婦字)大姓家主叩不經一卷提謂經一卷強羅經一卷金轉龍王經一卷蘇曷龍王經一卷三龍王經一卷虎王經一卷蝎王經一卷毒龍蛇施經一卷放牛法經一卷(今疑是藏中放牛經)養牛經一卷閻羅王經一卷(今疑是藏中閻羅王五使者經)餓鬼經一卷鐵杵泥犁經一卷緣經一卷藥經一卷苦慧經一卷慧達經一卷決法經一卷身數經一卷選福經一卷布施經一卷助善經一卷古來經一卷(今疑是藏中古來世時經)孝順經一卷緣本經一卷(今疑是藏中緣本致經)度世經一卷法藏經一卷明住經一卷善憩經一卷植質經一卷名相經一卷怪異經一卷滅怪經一卷本鉢經一卷案鉢經一卷諸法經一卷與脫經一卷伏願經一卷寶見經一卷真提經一卷明義經一卷見在經一卷釋論一卷(祐云疑是大智度論抄之一卷)雜事經一卷旨解經一卷(祐云疑即義旨難解)釋學經一卷度道俗經一卷諸福德經一卷說人身經一卷施色力經一卷色入施經一卷戒法律經一卷未生火經一卷未生災經一卷念佛品經一卷須彌山經一卷成敗品一卷(經目或云成敗品第四似是樓炭經之一品今撿樓炭無此品)世間珍寶經一卷(舊錄云世間所望珍寶經)現道神足經一卷成行無想經一卷悔過除罪經一卷深自僥倖經一卷布施持戒經一卷生西方齋經一卷造浴室法經一卷有疑往解經一卷長阿含方法經一卷令人孝有德經一卷人於出家者經一卷心應深貪慕經一卷地水火風空經一卷求欲者除意經一卷持戒教人止殺生經一卷七月十五日臘法經一卷功高憍慢有二輩經一卷歡喜布施有五事經一卷(本作勸字誤)三夢經一卷三悔處經一卷三乘無當經一卷四暑經一卷四等經一卷四政斷經一卷四厚經一卷五穀世經一卷五亂經一卷五邪經一卷六禪經一卷六度六十行經一卷六輩阿惟越致經一卷七眾經一卷五暑經一卷七流經一卷七使經一卷七輩人橫死經一卷七歲作善經一卷八方萬物無常經一卷八雙經一卷九結經一卷九惱經一卷九道觀身經一卷十部僧經一卷十二意經一卷十二意練若高行一卷十二部經名一卷三十二僧那經一卷三十四意經一卷五十德相經一卷六十品經一卷六十二疑經一卷七十二觀經一卷百法經一卷惟日三昧經一卷月電三昧經一卷無言三昧經一卷阿和三昧經一卷禪行法經一卷(今疑是藏中禪行法想經)須彌山譬經一卷日月譬經一卷海水譬經一卷藥草喻經一卷功德天譬經一卷賢劫譬經一卷金剛譬經一卷寶藏譬經一卷明珠譬經一卷聚木譬經一卷四大譬經一卷出要經下二百三十七經(並是梁僧祐錄中新集失譯經今附宋錄)從頂生王因緣經下。
